website_summaries.verdict: The Sony VAIO Fit 14 is a mainstream laptop that comes as close as you can without being an official ultrabook, but it went over specification. It's nice to look at and somewhat powerful, but a couple of issues keeping it from scoring higher.
pros: Comes with multimedia creation software like ArtRage, ACID, and Sound Forge

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go for another Sony having had my previous laptop for six years (it was working well but getting slow). I did not want a touch screen so the VAIO Fit E 15.5 inch laptop is great - it's the upgrade from Vista to Windows 8 which is the learning curve. However, I'm getting there.
customer_reviews.author: sheila purbrick

customer_reviews.title: Terrible mouse control
customer_reviews.text: The laptop in general is great but the touchpad is oversensitive and skittish. Jumps around all over the place and selects things without even clicking on them. Tried to change mouse settings but still no better. Its a nightmare!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: for highly computer literatted only
customer_reviews.text: I find out the software version quit difficultly manageable-I have to go from page to page to find what I really need and the Skype is very complicated, so I asked my son to install my old program and now I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Vida Jakum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great transaction. Goods arrived promptly and exactly as advertised. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: I B Savin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine!
customer_reviews.text: The Sony Vaio is an excellent laptop. It looks good, has a a very solid feel to it and performs well . Just one point though, which is nothing to do with the computer itself, is that I don't like Windows 8.
customer_reviews.author: PETER EDBROOKE

customer_reviews.title: Sony OK Windows 8 a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure there is nothing wrong with the Sony, but I hate Win 8 it's a nightmare getting past Microsoft trying to tie you into everything,Win 7 was so easy in comparison, maybe I'm too old.
customer_reviews.author: Rayveysey

customer_reviews.title: Sony Vaio
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this product, I knew what I was getting. Evenmore, I am getting used to the Windows 8 now which makes it even easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bibishan

customer_reviews.title: Worst laptop I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: ...and I've had a Dell. I don't know what the problem is with this computer, if it's the model, the operating system or some defect, but it's absolutely awful. So slow to use, it can barely handle switching between tabs on the internet. Things take forever to download, to open, to run; it's extremely frustrating. Windows 8 is terrible too. I've had a Sony Vaio before and it ran great and lasted for about 5 years, but I'm sending this one back after a week.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Not as much nerd power needed as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not only was I impressed at the speed with which this item was delivered, but I found it surprisingly easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy O** Woman

customer_reviews.title: Is an alright computer
customer_reviews.text: If you like a fast response computer this is definitely out of the question. But did just the job for my daughter's school work!
customer_reviews.author: L Lee

customer_reviews.title: NOT SO FAST
customer_reviews.text: the only problem that I have seen so far that it is not so fast especially when I'm using internet. if you have money and don't want to wait you should buy i5 or i7.
customer_reviews.author: duygu yılmaz

customer_reviews.title: Massive Wi-Fi Problem for European Buyers
customer_reviews.text: Please google sony vaio wi-fi issues, I wish i did. Otherwise a fast laptop but what use is it if wi-fi connection constantly drops.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Slick, fast n great
customer_reviews.text: This laptop handles really smoothly and is quick. It is streamline and lightweight so easy to to store. Has plenty of storage for music and photos etc.
customer_reviews.author: Clubfierce
